data.value: Power BI helps you start measuring the health of your business in less than 5 minutes. Sign-up and try it for yourself today.

data.value: Use Power BI for free or buy Power BI Pro

data.name: LiveSources_Content
data.value: Data sources that Power BI connects to directly rather than loading the data into the Power BI service. For example, using a gateway to connect directly to SQL Server Analysis Services.

data.name: META_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Power BI tranforms your company's data into rich visuals for you to collect and organize so you can focus on what matters to you. Stay in the know, spot trends as they happen, and push your business further.

data.name: Table_Caption
data.value:
Every user consuming Power BI Pro content requires a Power BI Pro License. Learn more about Power BI Pro content.

1 Natural Language query is currently only supported in English.

  • Prices shown per user per month but annual subscription is required.
  • Academic, Government and Non-profit pricing available.
  • Learn more about volume Licensing or find a Microsoft expert.
  • Pricing shown in US dollars for Commercial ERP through the Microsoft Online Subscription Program.
  • Tenants can have a mix of users with Power BI (free) and Power BI Pro licenses

data.name: Flyout_Capacity
data.value:
Data capacity limit details

  • Global limit for tenant = 10 GB x # of Power BI Pro seats purchased
  • Limit for a single personal workspace = 10 GB
  • Limit for a single group = 10 GB

data.name: Flyout_LiveData
data.value:
Live data source details

Data sources that Power BI connects to directly rather than loading the data into the Power BI service. For example, using a gateway to connect directly to SQL Server Analysis Services.

data.name: Flyout_ConsumeStreaming
data.value:
Power BI REST API

Push data directly from an application into a Power BI dataset. See the Power BI Developer Center for more information

data.name: Flyout_MaxDataRate
data.value:
Power BI REST API Limits

This is the max data rate for the Power BI REST API. See Power BI REST API Limits for more information.
